milestone.title: v0.1.0: Initial Documentation Setup
milestone.description: Set up initial documentation framework and organization mapping for the SPlectrum ecosystem. This milestone establishes the foundational documentation structure needed for project navigation and understanding across all organizations (SPlectrum, InfoMetish, Sesameh, Carambah, bare-for-pear).
